title: Gravity Provides an Investor Presentation
text:
Seoul, Korea, March 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
GRAVITY Co., Ltd. (NasdaqCM: GRVY) (“Gravity” or “Company”), a developer and publisher of online and mobile games based in South Korea, today issued an investor presentation.
The presentation contains the Company’s recent business updates, business plan and the preliminary results of fourth quarter in 2017. Based the preliminary financial results of the fourth quarter of 2017, which was disclosed on a Current Report Form 6-K dated February 2, 2018, Gravity has recorded its highest-ever annual revenues in 2017 since its incorporation in April 2000.
The presentation can be found on the Company’s website under the IR Archives section at http://www.gravity.co.kr/en/ir/pds/list.asp . English, Korean and Japanese versions of the IR presentation are available from the Company's website.
About GRAVITY Co., Ltd.
Based in Korea, Gravity is a developer and publisher of online and mobile games. Gravity's principal product, Ragnarok Online , is a popular online game in many markets, including Japan and Taiwan, and is currently commercially offered in 81 markets and countries. Also, the Company is globally offering various Ragnarok games, developed based on contents of Ragnarok Online . For more information about Gravity, please visit http://www.gravity.co.kr .
